Title: Great Trade In Experience
Content:
I recently decided to trade in some of my camera gear that wasn’t being used enough. The process was fairly straightforward I got a quote using the online service and then opted to bring my equipment in personally (there is an option for free collection by a courier) for it to be shipped away for inspection. Once the inspection was completed I was sent an email with the final quote which I was happy to see wasn’t far off the online quote, I accepted and the funds were deposited into my account on the same day. 

Overall great experience, I will definitely use Wex again if I need to trade in any of my gear.

Title: A positive buying experience
Content:
I recently bought a used camera from Wexphotovideo and found the product description both concise and helpful. For an older model the price was realistic and fair.

This is one of only a handful of companies which supplies a shutter count for its used cameras, something I consider quite important. They also offer a one year warranty for their used products while some of their major competitors only offer a 6 month warranty. I find this reassuring because it indicates that they have confidence in the quality of the used items they sell.

My camera was securely packaged and delivery was impressively fast. The condition of the camera matched the description provided on the website. I also got a follow-up email providing extra information relating to the purchase.

Overall a positive buying experience.

Originally asked for another pair to be sent, and then changed that to a different pair. No problem with the change of item. They reserved one for me and sent it as soon as the return arrived at their depot. It arrived the next day on a one hour time slot. Brilliant service, and highly recommended.

Title: Feedback counts - well done Wex!
Content: By coincidence, I needed a repair to a camera and, through insurers, had a totally different company to do the job. Wex kept me up-to-date with the progress of my purchase and the delivery company advised a date and timeslot. The package was delivered to me in person. There was nothing comparable with the other company; I had to phone the repairers to find the status of the repair (new parts arrived? repaired? not repairable?) and estimated date - a specific date and timeslot was not provided. Unlike Wex's delivery process, the repaired camera was left in the porch without so much as a knock on the door. In fairness, it was sensibly packaged. For service then, 5 stars to Wex, and 1 star to the other organisation. The purchase I made was for a zoom lens. It was not new, but in very good condition, was well packed and frankly, I'm very pleased with the quality and price. Alright, it might have been cheaper elsewhere but since I've used Wex before, I was sure that I could rely on good service and honest assessment of the condition of the lens. Again, 5 stars to Wex. I wonder why the insurers and the other company don't ask for feedback!

Title: Fuji XT5 purchase and Nikon Trade in
Content: I have purchased a fulifilm xt5 with a 16-80 kit lens and also a 23mm f2 prime lens. The online transaction and delivery were very efficient. I also visited the Glasgow store to sell some equipment to Wex and was blown away by the size of the store and the amount of equipment on display. I have received an offer for my equipment which I am happy with and again the transaction for this was fast and very professional. I will never shop anywhere else now for camera gear. The service is decide to none. Especially Jessops who have really went downhill in the last 10 years or so.

Title: First class service

First class service - I purchased a camera lens at lunchtime on Friday and it was delivered the following Monday morning, post free !
The lens was in superb condition, exactly as advertised and looked totally unused and was priced much lower than similar items featured on a well known internet and having the benefit of a proper guarantee and no inflated 'shipping' costs. Well done Wex and thank you very much for some proper service.

Recently I ordered the wrong size background by mistake and when I called to ask what I should do, was helped immediately and the problem was resolved. I have bought all my lights, light stands, backgrounds and cameras from them over the years and have always had a positive experience. I would highly recommend Wex Photo as the Nr 1 to go to for Photography Products!!  Lizzy Johnson Photography

Title: Having upgraded my old Apple iMac to a…
Content:
Having upgraded my old Apple iMac to a new 24" version I have begun trying to link older bits of kit, printers, scanners, Lacie's, Wacom tablet... etc... all with older USB connections and not the new USB-C.
My solution was a Minispuru dock that also acts as a base stand for iMac (colour co-ordinated) and also gives it much more stability. But would it work if I bought the latest Wacom Intuos tablet from WEX ?
Not only did the guys at Milton Keynes shop assure me it would, John actually plugged it into his own laptop to check it would and I left reassured with the confidence it could be returned if not.
Well it does work perfectly... and yet again I am impressed by WEX, a company I have been using for many years for all my photographic needs. Well done !

Title: Tried to make contact…..
Content:
Tried to make contact with a member of staff at the Nottingham branch I had spoken to just a few days ago re the purchase of one of three mirrorless cameras and associated lenses.  I was advised by a different member of staff that the person was on his meal break at the time (no problem, we are entitled to a meal break) and he would be seeing a customer after that. He enquired whether he could help but I had al ready had an in-depth conversation with the person I wished to speak to, so no.  I asked him to request the person concerned to call me back.   After a few minutes short of three hours wait I rang back.  This time I was advised the member of staff was not available, he was with a customer, could the person answering help.  I stated I had requested a call back three hours ago and he responded that today is a very busy day.  If I can’t get to re-connect with the person I was dealing with what service will I get when I’ve spent in the region of £2k.  Looks like I’m going elsewhere to make a purchase.

Since posting my original review yesterday I have had a response from the person I originally wished to speak with later in the afternoon.  He was most apologetic regarding the matter we resolved the issue.  Since then there has been a response to the posting from Wex Photographic customer support and a telephone call from the Nottingham branch manager, both apologising for the situation and changing practices.

Well, I can definitely state that Wex Photographic take matters seriously and clearly value their customers, hence my 1 star has shifted to 5 stars.

Title: Charlie was very pleasant to deal with…
Content:
Charlie was very pleasant to deal with when I visited WEX Nottingham. He recommended me a Canon camera which he had tried and tested himself and thought was best for my photography needs.

I asked many of questions regarding cameras, lenses, tripods, camera bags etc as I was very unsure about what I needed but he was soon able to put my mind to ease and before no time I was able to purchase a cheaper, second hand camera with an all round good lens, saving me hundreds on my first camera! 

I went in again for the second time as a SD card error message came up on the camera and again, Charlie spent over an hour teaching me how to use the camera and answered any further questions I had without any fuss.

Overall, I cannot stress how much Charlie really stood out in the store, he was not only very knowledgeable but his customer service was exceptional. 

He really needs a pay rise or promotion.

Batteries, power supply and HDMI cables for certain Sony cameras are not included.

This was mentioned in the description, however it would be really helpful to have them included and the price increased a little for convenience.

Title: Walked in to the Manchester store asked…
Content:
Walked in to the Manchester store asked Adam if they had the Canon 600m F4 ii lens in stock that was advertised on the web site, after a little searching in the stock room he returned with the lens to try out, it was in very good condition (secondhand lens as it is an EF lens) Tried it out just out side the shop went back in and did a deal (he adjusted the price to suit and a deal was done 
Adam is always very good even carried it to my car for me they are not small lenses it even came with the original Canon outer box as it would have done from the factory when new
 Straight to manchester velodrome and tried it out there  and under LED lights and it being a F4 it was brilliant just need to get used to the narrow field of view. Have used a 400mm 300mm and 200mm all F2.8 and it is a match for those in the velodrome 

Thanks to Adam and Wex

Its a back-up so its not really been used yet - but as a transaction it was all very good.

I emailed Wex straight away to let them and within 15 minutes they responded and dispatched a brand new battery with arrived the next day. I will be using Wex for all my future orders of cameras and lenses.

It arrived very quickly and looked almost new, complete with original box, end caps and hood. I have used Wex before and find their description of used lenses/bodies to be very accurate and I will without hesitation use them again.

A huge range of products, with real experts with a broad, in depth knowledge of photography and video available to speak to at all times, and a hugely efficient customer service offering too. Orders are despatched quickly, with delivery times way better than advertised most of the time, and their second hand / used range is a great source of really high quality bargains.  Thanks, WEX!

Title: Great Service
Content: I don’t make a habit of giving suppliers 5* but in this case it is well deserved. My old camera, lenses etc were getting very heavy even in my rucksack style camera bag! I wanted to save weight, upgrade my kit and reduce the number of lenses in my bag. I ordered a new camera set up (my old kit was at least 10 years old) and after reading reviews etc I settled on Canon as a brand. I ordered a new camera with zoom lens from Wex. The camera kit was in stock, had a £100 off offer on it, what’s not to like. I was blown away by how quickly Wex sent my camera, it was next day delivery and free of charge! I do not regret buying my kit from Wex, first class web site and excellent service.

Title: First experience using Wex - Can't fault it so far
Content:
I'll keep it short and to the point. 
- I was looking for a particular camera (Fuji X-T3) and came across Wex Photo's website. 
- It (the website) had multiple options of what I needed (same camera - different grading/conditions of the second-hand camera) and I chose the one I liked the best. 
- Payment went through without issue and easily. 
- Camera arrived the following morning (so pretty fast). 
- Everything is a desired (condition on the website seems to be accurate). 
- I'm still exploring my camera - but so far - can't fault the experience of shopping with Wex for the first time.

The shop carries a great range of products with demonstrators available to try. 
There’s good parking on site with easy access to the shop. Highly recommended.

Even the returns process was smooth, and while I did not enjoy returning my new camera unused, WEX made it as painless as possible. Will definitely use again!

Content:
Excellent experience, sold a couple of RF lenses through Wex the arranging of the free pickup was so easy, and they responded to a question I had very quickly.

They checked the lenses within a couple of days and agreed with my valuation on condition, I then noticed that I had selected Wex credit instead of a cash payment.

I rang Wex and the change was immediate, I was sent a link to fill in bank details, and though they said 1 day for money to reach bank it arrived within an hour or so.

I Highly recommend Wex to any seller or buyer

Title: Great customer experience!
Content:
I have been a Wex Photo Video customer for many years now, and I have just purchased a professional camcorder via the Wex website. I already had a pretty firm idea of which camera I wanted to get, but the clear and informative product information on the Wex website helped inform my decision. The ordering and checkout process was very straightforward, with next day delivery available at no extra charge. The camera arrived on the day and at the time indicated, suitably packaged as expected and with no problems.
I have also recently purchased items in store, and I have always found the sales team very knowledgeable and helpful. I can thoroughly recommend Wex Photo Video.

Title: Superb customer service
Content:
I wanted a case for my Sony RX10 which would fit neatly into a cycle touring bar bag. I was uncertain about sizing and phoned customer service. Jonathan was tremendously helpful. He understood my somewhat unusual requirement and very patiently worked through options.
The final choice was on the margins but Jonathan thought it might just work. And it’s absolutely perfect. The camera just fits and no more. That’s what I call true customer service. Thank you!

Content:
A helpful customer service experience and a speedy delivery of a beautifully packed item.  I am sad to report that this monopod is not compatible with my Kowa telescope.  The connecting screw to the scope footplate is much too large. I did not realise that such items did not use standard fittings.  I am away from home at the moment, (back Thursday 28th) so will be in touch regarding returning this item.  Apologies for the delay reporting this, but I have had problems with my laptop, hopefully now resolved.
Elizabeth Saunders

Title: Professional, friendly, helpful advice and support
Content:
I recently traded in all my Canon bodies & lenses and invested in new Sony A7 IV and lenses, I had incredible support from th guys at WEX whilst at the photography Show.
I then visited the Leeds store to trade in the last bit of gear and buy some extra bits.
I also needed some help with tethering Sony to Lightroom, after a while trying to figure out why this was not working, Luca came and saved the day, explaining Sony and Lightroom are NOT compatible? But took the time to get me set up with the Sony software and go through the camera settings etc...
I was so grateful for his time and support as well as other members of the Leeds team.
Truely grateful, thank you guys!

Content: Huge online choice, good pricing and fast, free delivery. I’ve found the trade-in option quick, easy & very fair in terms of valuations, and the couple of times I’ve been in-store the staff have been knowledgeable and helpful. Overall highly recommended.

Title: Ordered Hahnemuhle paper for my printer…
Content: Ordered Hahnemuhle paper for my printer and I used this company because I know it will come with the corners not dented which has happened before when using other companies. This is important because paper with the corner dented causes black ink to spill on to it and wreck a print . It’s too expensive not to be perfect.

Title: The delivery was very quick
Content: The delivery was very quick. The "used" camera looks like new - box was old, but who cares. I have tried the camera and lens and it seems fine. I had bought a replacement Canon M50 as I had lent (given!) my old one to my daughter who is travelling. I like the size and ease of use of this camera.

Title: Great firm to deal with.

Title: Great company for trading in, and buying new.
Content: WEX offered me a sum which I thought was acceptable for my lens but offered slightly more once they had received it. I accepted the offer and bought a new lens as a replacement. Very satisfied with WEX and have used them over many years. Good company and dependable. Well done.

Title: I had been thinking of upgrading, Wex made it easy
Content: I had been thinking of upgrading my Camera for a looong time. Always patient. polite and quick to reply to my many questions I would certainly recommend Wex to anyone serious about their photography.

Title: Excellent no catch service at Wex!
Content:
Wex Cameras and Video have an excellent website which allows extremely easy access to a wealth of photographic equipment. Comprehensive details and photos of all new and used items provide nearly everything you need to know about the items you are researching. You can easily compare products for price and specifications as well as check availabilty.
Trading in equipment is straightforward and, importantly, the price you could expect (linked to the condition you claim) is almost instantaneous with all details, labels etc. to send the items at no cost to yourself.  While you do not get "hands on" examination of equipment (unless you visit a store), I have always found that the product information supplied is very accurate.  I have been a happy customer since lockdown and I have positive experiences of all contact (telephone or email).  The lens I bought last week was ordered on Saturday evening and arrived on Monday at no charge.  I'm a fan!

Title: I bought a second hand telescope like…
Content: I bought a second hand telescope like new, very happy with the purchase and great price. Strongly recommend this guys. Thank you.

It's clear there's exceptional leadership behind this operation—they're setting standards we all should aspire to. I can't recommend them highly enough as both a service and a business model.  

As a demanding customer, I extend special thanks to Tony & Aran for their exceptional responsiveness. They attended to my urgent requests with perfect clarity in communication, demonstrating the high caliber of service that sets this business apart.

Title: Outstanding Customer Service - as ALWAYS
Content:
Outstanding customer service - as usual. Been to Wex many times before and ALWAYS get the same, consistent service - professional, unbiased and honest - and never 'heavy sales' focused where you feel pushed into a purchase. They are knowledgeable camera professionals, enthusiasts and users - NOT the casual 'bearded bods' from a 'purple branded' shop who haven't got a clue, have to consult 'the fountain of knowledge' and who just want 'a sale'!  The guys at Wex really know their stuff - no consulting a manual, no 'I'm not sure about that', no 'I'll have to check' - they know.  If Wex believe a product is not absolutely right for you they will tell you - even if that guidance 'costs them a sale'.

Their after sales service is second to none, and, as always - customer focused.

I cannot recommend them highly enough - simply OUTSTANDING !

Title: Used Grade 9+ in perfect condition.
Content: Ordered a Nikon Z6ii in a 9+ condition, it could easily have been sold as a 10. Perfect condition, and the only noticeable thing about it not being a new camera was  the wrapper being off the battery. Ordered late on a Friday afternoon, and delivered midday Saturday with regular updates of delivery. Really pleased with the service.

Title: Flash and lens bag
Content: Ordered  a used R1C1 nikon macro flash and new nikon cl-L2 lens bag. R1C1 came with in afew days and in excellent condition  and delivered to my safe place without a problem so very please, how ever the cl-L2 lens bag arrived  the next day. The bag itself is great well made and looks good will take D850 attached to 200-500 lens with internal padding in place so extremely satisfied and would definitely recommend this bag and wax photo. How ever DPD are a different matter wex and other photography companies insist on using this company  and depending on driver it depends where its left. A £800 lens and £150 bag left on door step in full view of anyone walking down my street in the pouring rain even though same instructions and same safe place. I personally think a safer company needs to be employed as I would have no leg to stand on if stolen or completely ruined due to useless delivery persons. This put a bit of a damper on the experience and would make me think twice about using companies who use this courier.

Title: 10 Star Customer Service
Content:
The whole process of finding what I wanted and placing the order was extremely easy which is as it should be on every website. However, I had reason to contact Customer Support over a problem with the courier company’s delivery. I had specifically paid for next day delivery (Saturday in this case) as I
wanted to familiarise myself with the equipment I ordered over the weekend for use the following week. Despite my work being a very large building (an Arts Centre where I am in charge of tech)  the courier was unable to find it. It was difficult to contact the courier - to whom I would only give one star on this occasion - so I contacted Wex Customer Service. This was late on Saturday evening and I didn’t expect an answer until Monday, However, on Sunday morning I had an email from Wex apologising and promising to try and sort it out. I have never had such good customer service from any other company. I would give them 10 stars if it were possible. I have my Zoom F3 field recorder now and will definitely be using Wex again.

Title: Top class service from search to delivery!
Content: WEX have a superb search engine to find whatever product you want. The email updates are also really clear. The products arrived well packed with DPD on time. Their part exchange service is also good and the refund of the exchanged product only takes a few days. Finally, on the phone, their customer advisers are excellent and efficient. Highly recommended!

Content:
Superb service. This was the first time I had used Wex and certainly wont be the last. I'd heard good reports from friends so decided to give them a go and wasn't disappointed. I bought a used Sigma 150-600mm contemporary lens for my Nikon and it arrived next day and was exactly described on their website. The price was excellent as is the lens itself. Really impressed with the whole service and experience.
An observation and not a criticism but another well known webiste that sells camera gear shows that you get a standard 6 month warranty with the item you're buying. I couldn't see that on the Wex website but that could purely be down to me missing it. Personally though it doesn't detract from the whole experience.

Title: I was having problems with a scanner…
Content: I was having problems with a scanner that I bought from Wex, it wouldn't connect with my computer.  Spoke to Levi at the Leeds store and we decided that I should bring the scanner along with my laptop and he would assist in trying to get it to function correctly.  After attempts by both of us to attempt to get it working, we came to the conclusion that it was a faulty scanner, and this fact was confirmed when we tried another scanner (of the same make and model) which worked at the first attempt of connecting it.  Many thanks to the store and particularly Levi who was most helpful.

Title: Very Helpful at Nottingham Wex

When I collected my order from the Wex store in NOTTINGHAM I asked for help to select a rucksack as none on display in the store had ideal compartments for my camera and new long lens. One of the staff went and got a new rucksack that the store had just received, which was absolutely perfect for my needs. Thank you. Much appreciated. Excellent branch.

Title: Exemplary service at WEX Norwich
Content:
Over the past month or so I have found time to research a switch from APS-C DSLR to Micro 4/3 rd. As I’m getting older I wanted to move to a more upmarket camera. Enhanced stability, the ability to shot video at 4k and a fully articulated screen, etc; led me towards a Panasonic G9. I found WEX Norwich had what I was looking for, a quick phone call reserved the camera and a few hours later I was the proud owner of a used Panasonic G9 body in mint condition with a very low shutter counter.

A few days later I had sorted through camera collection and obtained a trade in quotation for some Nikon equipment. The valuation seemed very reasonable but was subject to inspection. The equipment was delivered in person and within 48hrs a final price readily accepted and offset against the purchase of the G9. Making me, one very happy, bunny.

In my dealings with staff at WEX Norwich in person, over the phone and via email all questions were promptly answered, nothing was too much trouble and finally I must say the attentive and exemplary service I received was second to none and in the future I shall continue to interact this branch. 

A big thank you to the staff at Norwich for first rate service.

Title: R-16 Zoom recorder
Content:
Price
Speed
Simplicity 
Generally a good product
BUT a tiny window and loads of menus makes for a really crappy experience. 
In the real world it's impossible to mix on this with that menu system. 
This is a classic example of something designed by a geek on a computer, who will never use it, not by a musician who needs to use it every day. Its systems are pedantic and not instinctual.
Better software, a few more buttons and a bigger, touch sensitive screen, would make all the difference and not cost much more to do it. I would have bought that and loved it. 
This is a great little recorder,, but that's all.
Sad because this could be a superb product.

Title: Fabulous first time buying experience at Wex…
Content: Fabulous first buying experience at Wex photo/video in Glasgow.  All the staff were friendly and approachable and ensured I was getting any help I wanted. The instore senior sales associate who assisted me paid close attention to what I was looking for in a camera, gave me time to show the types of photos I like to take and to explain to her the limitations I found with the camera I had been using. The sales assistant was so patient and knowledgeable in helping me to select and obtain camera and lens options to consider in order to improve my experience of taking photos. The sales assistant made herself available to follow up on selecting the final camera and lenses I wanted on a second visit to the Glasgow store. My order arrived there as I had wanted further expert advice before making my final purchase and I had found the sales assistant to be evidently very experienced and professional on my initial visit to Wex photo/video. The delivery of the cameras and lenses from England to Glasgow was quick and efficient so I had no waiting around. The whole experience at Wex made my first purchase of a serious camera so pleasurable. I chose a used camera and two lenses which are in fabulous condition so had an extra few pounds for a natty and convenient little cross-body camera bag.

Title: I've been using wex for some time now
Content: I've been using wex for some time now, and I have always had a good experience. Last time I decided to trade-in my old camera. I chose the condition of the camera and boxed it up. When they received it, they found the camera to be in better shape than I told them so they adjusted the trade in price and offered me more money. This was the decent thing of them to do. Most businesses are quick to find problems with your trade to be able to decrease the value. This was a pleasant surprise that wex is willing to do the opposite if they think the value is higher than originally quoted. Brilliant service!

Title: I ordered an item (DJI mic 1) and…
Content: I ordered an item (DJI mic 1) and wanted to exchange that with newer version (DJI mic 2). I rang customer service, he offered me help straight away by ordering the newer item and called next day to receive it. I went in and whole refund/exchange process was quibble free and smooth. Felt very welcomed and they were available to answer my queries. Brilliant company!

Title: The first time WEX does not get 5 stars…
Content:
The first time WEX does not get 5 stars from me! The overall shopping experience was good and the delivery was lightening quick, however.... the used lens I purchased arrived really dirty and dusty all over, specs of dirt all over the glass element, dust in the focus ring and in the aperture ring. The lens was rated a 9, and to be fair if it was cleaned up it is a 9 or even 9+ but the condition it arrived in was more like an 8. I've shopped with Wex many times before and never had any issues, the service was always spot on, hoping this was an anomaly. I will continue to shop at Wex based on previous experiences but this one definitely was not great.

Update: originally 3 stars, after the response it went to 5!!! Wex saw my review and immediately took action. I was really pleasantly surprised by the response from the Wex team, from the customer service team to the manager of the Newcastle branch from which the lens was sent. I was offered a free of charge cleaning service of the lens, received a compensation voucher and an apology from the manager of the branch. Like stated above, this experience does not put me off shopping with Wex, the response was fantastic after the review was posted an I couldn't be more pleased. Kudos

Title: On a None buying visit
Content: I'm a very old Photographer, going back to the days of Selling and Cross in Baker Street, it was wonderful to see Wex has a showroom in Sunny Putney, so I must confess with no intention at this moment of buying I went into the showroom just to look and get the feel of the place, got all the cameras i need, so I started to look at the telescopes, wow, then Mark appeared at my side, I apologised that I was not in the market for buying, just looking, that was No Problem to Mark and he was so generous in the manner of telling me about the telescopes, I'm potty about the stars, Thank You for your generous welcome and not making me feel i should not be in the shop for just wanting to get the feel of your new shop in my part of town. Thank You. Clive Boursnell

Title: Great company to deal with
Content: Great company to deal with.I was buying a pre owned Nikon lens and payment page froze so I rang them up and a very pleasant advisor was great,sorted the problem out, this was mid afternoon and lens arrived next day.Brilliant

Title: Purchasing a bridge camera
Content: Was placed on a wait list for the product i wanted to purchase,Kept up to date on the status of that order and when available the item was sent out and delivered the next day...Very good customer services that are always ready to answer questions and help out less experienced customers.

Title: Needed a tripod
Content: Needed a tripod, looked for a decent one and found Wex to have great deals. Even got a free mic for the camera, which was all delivered the next day. Brilliant, thanks.

Title: Great service from WEX PV
Content: Great service from WEX PV. Great trade in experience. Was paid well and more after checking. The lens I purchased used, came well packed and condition as described. Will purchase again from this company when needed.

Title: Issue resolved helpfully
Content: I ordered a Think Tank camera bag from Wex, unfortunately the wrong product was delivered (easily done). When I contacted Wex the bag I wanted was no longer in stock and they offered a similar slightly more expensive bag as replacement. I decided not to take up this offer and the bag and express delivery costs were refunded promptly. I have regularly ordered from Wex and this was the first time I have not received what I ordered and I was very impressed at their customer service in resolving this for me. Will definitely continue to shop with them.

Title: I traded in my Fujifilm  T3 for  a Fujifilm H2
Content: I traded in my Fujifilm  T3 for a Fujifilm H2 camera. The transition was easy. Wex sent me an initial quotation which was fine. I purchased the camera online and it was easy to offset the cost against their credit for my T3 camera. The camera arrived by courier within 48 hours in excellent packaging thus no damage. I’m very pleased with the camera. They have also written to me offering assistance in setting it up. Thanks

Title: A great place to shop with people you can trust.
Content: I had travelled quite a long way to visit Wex Photo in Newcastle. I was not disappointed. I was dealt with by Philip and also the Manager they assured me that the canon adaptor which I needed to work with a Sigma lens which I also purchased in the store, would be delivered to them today. I have previously been let down by a camera shop, so i was a bit sceptical. However I decided to trust them and I am glad I did! A short time after I arrived home I received and email saying the adaptor had been despatched and I would receive it the next day. Great service from both Philip and the Manager. Nice to know they are people you can trust. Well done guys, I will be back in the future.

Title: Quick fair service
Content:
I have used Wex for two fairly major part exchanges and on both occasions found the process to be quick and fair with very good and promt communications. Payment of funds is simple and secure.
I have also purchased equipment from them outside part exchanges, the website is easy to navigate, prices are fair and delivery is prompt.
I’m very satisfied with the services provided by wex.
I agree more may be obtained by selling equipment privately rather than by using any part exchange scheme, but I have found the Wex scheme, fast, hassle free, with no postage fees and very satisfactory outcomes.

Title: Thoroughly Recommended
Content:
I have used Wex several times and experienced their service from many angles. 
I have posted questions, purchased, part-exchanged and returned unwanted gear. 
Their service has been excellent on all counts, without exception.

Their prices are comparable with other stores and I know that I will always be able to contact them post-purchase if I have problems and they will genuinely try to help.

Another good thing is that they have actual high street shops as well as their online shop, so I have been able to visit and see equipment for myself before purchasing. 
Thoroughly recommended.

Title: Great advice, service and price
Content:
I sought advice from the Wex online sales team on a Thursday and received a resposne within an hour or 2, spent time following up / researching the advice and placed an order just after 5.00 pm that day with free delivery within 2 - 3 days.
The next morning I had a text and email advising that the item would be delivered that day (Friday) and within a given 1 hour time slot. That delivery was on time and courteous. I was able to set up the monitor and uisng it within 24 hours of seeking advice - you can't realy beat that and the price was good.

Title: Excellent Customer Service
Content: When I had to make a big purchase for a new camera, the customer service of Wex Photo Video has been one of the best I have ever experienced. I always prefer to talk on the phone about all of the questions and doubts that I have about a purchasing a product. Not only did they answer the calls very quickly but all the people that I talked to were extremely helpful and kind. In a day where everything is becoming more digitised and it's getting harder and harder to speak to a human on the phone to ask some questions. It's truly a pleasure to be able to experience a customer service like this one. I really could not recommend their service more from this initial purchase. 5/5 Stars!

Title: Best and prompt service as usual
Content: Best and prompt service as usual. Have bought used gear and sold with WEX a few times. Top notch service as usual.

Title: Good prices for used equipment.
Content: Wex’s online quote for my old camera equipment was quite a lot higher than the offer I was made by another part exchange camera shop with a branch in Newcastle. The other firm offered only a credit note whereas Wex offered the option of cash or a credit-note  to buy new. I posted off the equipment, and half expected Wex to reduce the amount quoted after examination (as some firms do). Apart from a few pounds deducted for a missing lens cover, (which I had ticked off as included) the quote remained the same. I decided to go for the part-exchange option and the process was very smooth from start to finish.

Title: An Excellent Customer Service Experience
Content:
I recently made an order on finance for a new camera which came with a kit lens and a lens for free in a deal. The deal lens was out of stock which meant a delay in shipment of the entire order.

The customer service team were very happy to help in finding out when the lens in question would be back in stock and made some adjustments to make sure that I would receive my kit in time. 

I would highly recommend the customer service staff who dealt with my queries and went above my expectations to resolve my issues.

Thank you to you all.

They could not be more help, sorted and replaced with no fuss at all. Brilliant service.

It was an expensive camera and a few days after the purchase they followed it up with a thank you email and an offer of a free 30 minute video conference to help set up the camera.
It is these sort of extras that make Wex Photo Video a stand out place to shop.
They are the first place I will look for any future purchases.

Title: Extremely professional
Content: A few days ago I ordered a second hand filter from Wex Photographic. It was supposed to be delivered on Friday but failed to turn up. I informed them and on Saturday I received a phone call saying that they had found the item, which had fallen off the conveyor belt. They apologised and upgraded the delivery to be delivered on Sunday. It arrived a few minutes ago in perfect condition. I, and my photography friends, are very impressed by the professionalism shown by the staff at Wex Photographic. No doubt their profit was minimised on this item but they gained a whole lot of respect by doing what they did. 5-stars from me.

Wex stood out from other companies I've shopped with so will be shopping with them for future photography products.

Title: Wonderful Customer service
Content: Bought my Daughter a used Canon camera and lenses as an upgrade to her existing camera. While at Uni she borrows a certain model and Wex had one in stock at a good price. I bought a couple of lenses too and all items were as described and although I bought them in October they were for Xmas. When we opened the charger that came with the camera it had the wrong charger in it so we could not charge either of the batteries. I contacted customer support to let them know in case they had another box with the wrong charger in it. As it had been 2 months since ordering it I did not ask for a refund etc. customer service were amazing, looked into the order and have sent us brand new charger as a replacement next day. I seriously cannot fault Wex from the item descriptions, delivery and after sales. An amazing company to deal with and will be using for all Camera purchases in the future

Title: Wex Photo & Video Part Exchange
Content:
I took all my old Nikon Pro gear into Wex Birmingham at 10am on Boxing Day to see if I could arrange a partexchange on some new Sony gear. 

I can only say that the staff in the store were absolutely fantastic. They clearly knew what they were doing and were refreshingly friendly from start to finish. 

To my amazement I had an email from them the next day making me an excellent offer on my old Nikon gear, I placed an order for the new Sony gear right away and 24 hours later at 8:30am a nice man from DPD dropped off my new toys. 

One of the best experiences I've had in ages.

Title: My RF-S 10-18 lens arrived, but my firmware was out of date
Content: My RF-S 10-18 lens arrived and I fitted it to my camera only to be told my firmware was out of date. Tried updating as per Canon's web site, no success. Telephoned WEX and although I had plenty of help still failed to update. In desperation went on a 80 mile round trip to Wex BIrmingham where Jake Craig found that the lens had to be removed for the update to take place. Brilliant service from him. Very professional and very understanding of my dilemma. He even took the bother to make sure my Canon app worked with the camera. A brilliant service so many thanks.

Title: Attentive and knowledgeable
Content: Wishing to trade-in my old camera kit and replace it with a new one was a big ask for me but it was made extremely seamless by the Wex Cambridge team. By phone I was given suggestions about options to look at to meet my handling limitations and helpful comments about possible decisions. In store I was able to handle the equipment, experiencing the weight of cameras with different lenses. Having found those too heavy, the assistant (Rachel) offered possible alternatives until we found the perfect solution. I was impressed by her careful listening and considerable product knowledge. The Trade-in team was also helpful guiding me through the process of exchange. I will be back in for more items in the new year!

Title: Waiting for a Trade in price.............
Content: As a senior citizen I made the tumultuous decision to "trade in" my 20+ years collection of branded camera gear for something lighter. Having listed and submitted my equipment for pricing, I called into the Norwich branch because I had been told by email that the pricing will be with you shortly, It was not forthcoming.  I approached some staff and asked if someone could help me? Chris Dunning said sure, what's the problem? I explained the issue and he said, "Have you checked your Junk Folder?"  I looked on my phone and realised I had no signal so he gave me the Wi-Fi code. There was the quote as stated on the email. He explained that I needed to get the products to WEX to confirm the valuation before they could offset against a new sale or credit to my account. Because of the way Chris dealt with my problem I decided to buy the new equipment whilst I was there. He was very helpful and explained the buy back pricing and where an almost new Used piece of equipment might be a better option. I took advantage of the 6 months interest free option to get my gear now and pay it all off before the 6 months ended. I subsequently took my old equipment into the Cambridge branch where I received the same great service and advice. Both sites give me great confidence in the companies ability to deal with a customer with knowledge and patience.

I highly recommend this company and would not hesitate to  use again if the need arises.

I'm now very happy with my new adapter.  I do wish they wouldn't use DPD though - Evri is much more reliable, in my area at least.

Title: As ever Wex are brilliant to deal with.
Content:
As ever Wex are brilliant to deal with.

The used Three Legged Thing L bracket is undoubtedly a well made product and versatile, with one proviso. The stainless bolts which you remove to change the aspect of the bracket, screw in to a very shallow thread in the aluminum of the bracket. It is very easy to strip that thread, as I have done. I suggest a threaded stainless insert would overcome the problem or allowing a deeper thread purchase by using slightly domed, round headed bolts rather than countersunk.

Title: Milton Keynes Wex - helpful and engaging (Leo Moss)
Content:
The Milton Keynes Wex team has been consistently decent, especially when you consider the often sometimes contrary, sometimes specific use cases of their target shopper.

Unlike many sales roles, the video/photo sector indeed requires patience and knowledge.

I needed a camera and lens combo that could cope with not only my own work, but equally cater to any ad hoc fashion shoots.  B-roll for video and obviously fashion/product photography (my partner won 4 national fashion awards last year, opening shows in Marrakech, closing a show in Rabat and opening again in London Southbank… and she has an even bigger year planned in 2024). 

“Leo(nardo)Moss” is one of the guys at Wex (Milton Keynes) and seeing my struggle, actually listened to my list of requirements and didn’t immediately try to go for the sales jugular.  He instead managed to focus my search.

He’s a talented lad and his professional take made the whole experience genuinely informative and rewarding, rather than one that would see me immediately hopping online and trawling the net for the cheapest price.  

My camera arrives in a couple of days and I want to marry it with a couple of lenses.  Leo has kind of sold me on a zoom, prime combo, but am going back in with my camera to finalise.  In the meantime I ordered a CFExpress type B and a spare battery.

If all assistants across Wex had the energy and approachability of this assistant, I think Wex would be doing generally better.  Credit to their company.

Title: Amazing customer service after a problem!
Content: Actual customer service was great, but let down by the website saying that an item (camera) was in stock, which I ordered together with a micro SD card.  I was a bit taken aback when I had a same day notification that the SD card had been dispatched but the camera would be sent when back in stock.  I don't order items that aren't available, so this was a bit of a surprise.  Contacted customer services who  said that the item was in stock at one of the shops and could be dispatched the next working day from there, but after some confusion about whether it could in fact be sent to the Isle of Man from the shop decided to cancel.  Was then contacted by customer services by email who said that as it was a new release, nobody had it in stock (so why did the website say differently when I initially ordered and why did a shop have one in stock?).   Checked straight away with another large retailer and they said it was in stock there, but as time was critical to get this item before commencing a trip it was now to late to order from the competitor.   - Update!  Wex have been amazing in dealing with what was probably a minor technical glitch on the website.  Several emails, a refund that I would never have asked for and a gift voucher, really overdoing it for what was, to be honest, a minor inconvenience.  I've always been very pleased with them in the past, if it wasn't for the imminent trip I would just have let the order stay and taken delivery when the stock arrived, but I really didn't want to take the risk of a parcel being left unattended while I was away (it happens often here!)

Content:

Title: My daughter wanted a telescope …
Content:
My daughter wanted to buy a telescope for her husband and asked my advice. 
I know nothing about them and so circulated my contacts. 
I was recommended your company by a good friend who raved about how helpful you are in your advice. 
My daughter telephoned and said the same - so very helpful and needed me to make the secret purchase. 
The telescope as well as the free torch arrived the next day. 
A genuinely fantastic service and I have no hesitation whatsoever in endorsing them.

Title: Fist class service again !!
Content: Once again the service from Wex was first class. Just over 24hrs from order to delivery !!

Title: Brilliant Very pleased with customer service
Content: Very pleased with customer service. Helpful and honest with prices and delivery. Choose over nasty amazon any day! Even if more expensive we need to support small companies over the conglomerates.

Title: First class advice
Content: I spoke to one of the advisors on the phone for about half an hour. Extremely helpful. Great to speak to someone totally on top of their subject. Wouldn't it be great if all companies were like Wex........

Title: I have always used Nikon in the past…
Content: I have always used Nikon in the past but I wanted a mirrorless, high resolution APSC camera and Nikon don't have one.  I chose the Fuji X-H2 with six lenses and when I noticed the WEX offers, decided to buy. I bought the camera and three lenses online and then ordered the remaining three lenses from the Cambridge store along with a charger, a spare battery and memory cards. I got good prices, quick delivery and all went according to plan. Essentially, WEX did precisely what they said they would do. The Fuji gear is superb and I am really pleased I changed. One slight niggle is that the prices offered on the website for my Nikon gear were disappointing which means I will have to go down the Ebay route.

Title: Shops as well.
Content: Not only an online facility but also regional shops where they know their stuff.

Title: Fast delivery as promised
Content: Took up the offer of free next day delivery and item arrived well packed and less than 24 hours after ordering with good communication throughout.

Title: Another straight forward and…
Content: Another straight forward and efficiently handled purchase from Wex. Thanks again.

Title: Have bought from WEX a number of times…
Content: Have bought from WEX a number of times over the past year. Everytime the webshopping experience was smooth and straightforward. The Items have arrived on time, very well packaged and protected.

Title: Quick

Title: Great price and quick delivery

Content: The used lens arrived and appears as described. It is a Christmas present but I am looking forward to giving it a run out soon ! I had a problem with the paypal pay in 3 and Terry did his best to sort it out and was extremely helpful. Unfortunately the problem was with paypal who couldn't have been more UNhelpful But this is not the fault of Wex.

This Kenro is extemely good and great value at £150 post free.

Title: Fantastic work team Wex!
Content: The measure of a great company is how they respond when things go wrong. I have ordered from Wex in the past without any glitches. This time I ordered two parcels, an expensive tablet and a stand. Only the stand arrived. Unfortunately, it had both parcel labels on the box, so Fedex indicated both items were delivered. I phoned Wex and they answered the phone promptly. I explained what had happened, they checked their warehouse video, found my tablet, and I received it the next day. This is how errors should be sorted out. Fantastic work team Wex! I will be buying from Wex again in the future and give them my highest recommendation. They are an honest and trustworthy business. It is businesses like this that Britain needs more of! Buy from Wex with complete confidence as they are a truly great company to deal with.

Title: Amazing service and knowledge
Content: Amazing service. First I needed some advice and guidance on a camera that I had bought from somewhere else that didn’t seem to be working as expected. I took it in to my local store in Norwich and was helped by the sales consultant Layne. She was brilliant. So helpful and given I hadn’t even purchased from Wex, she couldn’t have been more supportive in helping check my camera and compare against one in store. She was so helpful, I went back a couple of days later and bought a Canon EOS 7Dmkii from Chris who was also amazingly helpful and knowledgable. I am so impressed with the service and knowledge that I don’t think I need to ever go anywhere else now. Thanks to the team at Norwich.

Title: Excellent
Content:
Excellent. I have used the Birmingham branch and also hired mirrorless cameras and lenses from Wexrental department.

The staff at the Birmingham branch have been great, they have brilliant product knowledge, are enthusiastic about photography and are always happy to take time to explain technical matters to a novice like myself.

Thanks for providing an awesome service.

Title: Excellent compromise
Content: I simply wanted a reasonably priced waterproof camcorder with a viewfinder to record junior football matches. Well, there aren't any and the alternative Bridge or Mirrorless cameras were at best 'weatherproof' and also had a 25min.59secs video duration which is no good for football and had a poor battery life so I'd given up looking. Then I saw a 'pre loved' Lumix Fz 330 for sale at a price so attractive that I was prepared to accept the necessary compromises. The camera was actually in better condition than advertised and looks and works as good as new and also comes with a guarantee. The camera was also delivered free the day after I ordered it. I've no complaints with Wex at all.

Title: It annoys me that every time you make…
Content: It annoys me that every time you make an online purchase you seem to be prompted by Trustpilot to give a review explaining what was 'great' or 'otherwise' about your experience. Can we just stop this please. FWIW I had an acceptable and expected experience, it was neither earth shatteringly good or bad etc, it just was what it was. To me the most important test to a shopping experience comes when you need to resolve an issue, and how the company you bought from deals with that. I like WEX, I've shopped with them countless times and will continue to do so whilst they sell what I want/need at an appropriate and acceptable price point etc. I just don't want to be asked every time I do so to rate that particular experience.

I found the part exchange scheme easy to use and is very fair. I pride myself in looking after my equipment and the WEX staff rated my items as I hoped.

The staff in my local store in Edinburgh have been great, my thanks to Robyn and Carlos.

Title: Really good customer service
Content:
I am very happy with Wex. I've gone on a bit of a shopping spree over the black friday with them. I've ordered online, the parcels were well protected (in contrast with Amazon, that's always a gamble). 

Additionally, when a few days later, Wex has stated to thow in a free spare battery with the camera I've purchased days prior, it took me just a quick chat with the customer support to get the spare battery shipped to me for free. 

They got a loyal customer this way.

Magali

Title: Wex Photography at it's absolute best...
Content:
I have been buying from Wex for years always top service. I purchased a second hand camera 3 lens. Then just after that I took ill... Hospital and was given pretty the worst news ever.  I hadn't used the camera because of this and it was past the 30 day return.  

I contacted Wex and explained my situation and how I would not be able to ever use this camera now.

Wex were so understanding, sent me a return label they paid for and after the goods arrived...I got a full refund.  That helps me enormously under the circumstances.

Wex are one of the few companies now that I rate highly when before my medical situation but in light of how they dealt with this situation.... They are top notch.

Thx to Wex.

Title: 1st Time Customer
Content:
1st Time Customer 

Outstanding Quality and Delivery From the order being placed to the arrival of the product (early) this was a simple smooth transaction and the item was exactly as it was described (actually better than I thought)

The delivery was within 48hrs which was also free so again saving money. Its arrival was earlier than I expected and the package was perfect well protected outside and inside.

I received exactly what I ordered and I can't complain about anything the price was £105 lower than MPB who I regularly use.

Would I recommend this company YES 100% 

Will I use this company again YES ABSOLUTELY

Well done guys 5* 10/10

Title: I love buying my gear from Wex
Content: I love buying my gear from Wex. They stock everything I need as a professional photographer, at a competitive price and I usually receive it the next day. Can’t ask for more than that!

Title: Promt delivery and excellent service.
Content: Have have used Wex on two occasions now and both times found the online descriptions very accurate to the goods you are buying. Added to this very prompt delivery times given when ordering.  Ordered a big lens at 3.30 pm and it arrived at 9 pm the following day. Excellent service.

Title: Very helpful staff, relaxed atmosphere
Content: I was looking to get into a little more serious photography, with a grown-up camera and was very interested in the Fujifilm XT5.  Vanessa at the Edinburgh Wex was fantastic.  We spent a lot of time chatting over things and she gave me very helpful advice.  She helped me find the perfect bag too, by ordering in different options for me to try.  There was no over-selling, in fact she advised I should wait before buying something if I wasn't sure.  6 weeks later and I'm absolutely delighted with my purchases. I want to go back there and chat more and buy more things.. but I think that's the photography GAS bug! :-D

Title: Great product range

As well as buying from Wex I have also sold to them and have always been satisfied with the price offered and the process. To sum up I would not think of buying my photography gear any where else as Wex cannot be beaten in terms of the whole buying experience, customer satisfaction and confidence.

Title: Exceptional customer service, long warranty and competitively priced used lenses
Content:
Bought 2 used lenses for my Nikon DSLR. Price was competitive with other 2nd hand sites, but Wex give a 12month warranty, rather than the usual 6months most 2nd hand retailers offer. 
Delivery was quick and efficient and both lenses were as described.
Unfortunately, one lens had a problem. I called Wex and dealt with a lovely guy who was polite, helpful and bent over backwards to get the problem resolved effectively and efficiently. A replacement lens was identified, purchased and despatched immediately, with the faulty one collected and refunded super efficiently. 
Based on this experience I’d recommend Wex 100% for their exceptional customer service.

Title: Customer service was good but I ordered…
Content:
Customer service was good but I ordered this and the website allowed me to select next day delivery and charge me for it. I was waiting for a confirmation email which never came so I got in touch with the CS team on the day the delivery should've happened. Although paid for next day delivery they scheduled me for almost 2 weeks later? Very very bad of them..never had a refund and got my parcel the day after in the end but the whole experience was not great..for a simple purchase in the end.

Update: The issue might have been the lack of knowledge or understanding of your advisor but you made up for the mishap and confirmed clearly why the outcome was as above. I can say that I wasn't expecting a response in the first place but I feel you’ve gone above and beyond. Thank you!

Title: Think I have already left a review
Content:
Think I have already left a review. However, I purchased a printer from Wex about a week ago. Delivery was like WOW, how quick was that, just 1day. That was fast.
Setting up printer was ok, not that easy but then again, not to difficult. I did have to ring Wax help section about receipt and was told it was sent via email. How stupid was I. 
I have dealt with Wex before and I had a similar experience, so it seems that this is my company when I want to purchase anything to do with Photography. Thanks Wex for your excellent service over my purchasers, which has never causes me any problems to date.

Title: For your photo/video needs, second to none

Content: The Wex website is easy to navigate and I have been able to find exactly what I wanted on several occasions. Each of the items I was looking for were in stock and it was a straightforward exercise to order, pay for and arrange delivery. My items were delivered quickly, bang on schedule and safely. I have also spoken to Wex staff on the phone and in every case they have been friendly, professional, helpful and answered my queries to my total satisfaction. They have a well-deserved excellent reputation and I will be shopping here again soon.

Title: John Willis
Content: Had a great day today at Wex Manchester. Met John Willis who looked after me.  Great chat wanted to look at new backpack to easily store tripod, monopod, stool as well as cameras etc. Marrowed it done to a few and with Johns help it was easy to decide which one.  I also purchased an RF extender 1.4.  But had a really great visit so helpful, no pushy salesman totally relaxed and enjoyable visit.  It's a little bit of a distance to drive to but will not hesitate in going back to see the products close up.  Photography equipment is expensive and you need to see what you are buying.  Thanks John for all your help today and look forward to speaking when my kit arrives.

Title: Excellent service
Content:

Wex sprang into action to ensure that I was happy with the outcome and was offered a number of options. Can't fault their service.

They also do trade-in and hire items as well. Their service though is the 5* part ... recently had a smallish service issue ... they responded within hours ... I emailed and spoke to real people (not AI chatbots) ... and the issue was resolved pretty much the same day. Beats amazon hands down and then some. Will be my go-to for future camera items from now on.

Title: Great service from the website and Birmingham shop
Content: Great service from the website and the Birmingham (Hagley Rd) shop. Have spent months dithering and researching different cameras, lenses, brands etc. While gradually handing over stuff as part of a trade-in, Scott, Damian and Harjeev were very helpful and patient throughout the process, which was complicated by my indecision. I was able to shed a lot of equipment and get an amazing deal on some new things, which was exactly what I had hoped for. Great prices on a huge range of equipment, staffed by friendly, experienced and knowledgeable people. Have had some interesting conversations about the pros and cons of different brands/models etc without ever feeling like I was being talked into buying anything in particular, or under pressure to make a decision, which was immensely helpful.

Online service is great, items arriving as tracked, well packaged and in good time.

Thank you guy’s keep it up 

Kind regards 
D Evans

Title: Excellent service, as always from Wex
Content: I ordered something that was out of stock. I placed the order on a Saturday, and I expected to hear nothing for weeks if not longer. In fact, I had a notification that my item was available the following day - a Sunday - and the parcel arrived on Monday lunchtime! It was very well packaged, and the item itself - Tenba BYOB 10 - is a brilliant thing, enabling me to carry my kit safely and easily in my everyday messenger bag. I've never been disappointed or let down by any aspect of Wex's operation, and I'll remain a loyal customer.

Title: I always like dealing with Wex…
Content: I always like dealing with Wex photography and like that they now have a shop in Glasgow near me. Their reviews are always interesting and the exchange system they have is good. Content:

Pgytech gloves (for those winter matches)
A great pair of gloves but - if considering these - do check the sizing.
My palm is 10cm across and ordered the XL gloves - they are snug, not restrictively so but it's worth erring on the side of caution when choosing these gloves.
Just to repeat - these are great gloves.

Title: Going the extra mile…
Content: My goods ended up going around three delivery hubs because due to an urgent call I had to go out on the day of delivery (by Parcelforce). I rescheduled for another day and waited in all day to no avail despite the app telling me it was out for delivery. I wrote to WPV’s sales team to let them know what had happened. They got on to it and my parcel did appear on the Monday; although this was in no way their fault, WPV kindly refunded my next day delivery charge and gave me a £25 voucher (no time limit) by way of compensation for the inconvenience. That’s what I call service. The actual products were fine btw.

Title: Thank you to Robyn at Wex in Edinburgh…
Content: Thank you to Robyn at Wex in Edinburgh for sorting out my trade-in of a Canon EOS M6II with a pile of additional kit in exchange for the lovely Canon R6MkII and a 24-105 F4 L lens - broke for a little while but Robyn pulled out all the stops to give me the best trade in, price and experience, will be returning soon

Title: Excellent customer service
Content:
Anyone can deliver good service if it's just posting boxes, the real test is when there is an issue.
I received one part of my order that was the correct box for what I ordered, but unfortunately contained the wrong item.
Not the fault of the WEX dispatchers, outwardly it was correct & there was no reason why they would check as it was a new item.
When reported back (late on Saturday) I had a response back the following morning (yes, Sunday!) from customer service with an apology & a return arranged.
Posted back on Monday morning & refunded on Tues (it was the last of a discontinued item so no replacement available).
Fair to say that I will continue to shop at WEX and am more than happy with the service.

Title: Impressed!  Prompt!  Well packed!  Great Price & Service!
Content: A birthday gift!  Also impressed with the follow up, asking if there's anything more they can do for me.  With my own experience in the past with packing, I was at first taken back by the size of the box my order came in, "Did I order that?"  And then I found out why, it was soooo well packed up that it could have dropped two stories and the item inside wouldn't have been damaged - very impressed.  We used to say items needed to be packed so well that if you threw them against a wall they'd survived with their contents undamaged.  I would not hesitate to order from this company again.  Also - the BEST PRICE! - for the item ordered...

Title: Purchase of used camera
Content: I recently ordered a used Canon 7D II from WEX Photographic (as a replacement for my 7D which had died).  The camera arrived very quickly.  The camera was described as being of used condition 9 (very light use).  Apart from the shutter count, which I would consider very low anyway for a used camera, one would have struggled to say that the camera was not new.  Unfortunately, the wrong interface cable was suppled with the camera. With the best will in the world, mistakes happen occasionally, and WEX's response to the issue was all that it should be and more.  WEX did not have the correct interface cable in stock, and so offered me the choice of waiting for WEX to obtain stock, or a refund of the price of the cable so I could source the cable elsewhere and  WEX even identified a supplier for me who had the cable in stock, which I think was more than they needed to.  I have previously purchased photographic equipment (eg lenses) from WEX, and given my recent experience, I will definitely continue to do so.

Title: Elinchrom Strobe: Great Service from WEX.
Content:
Used Elincrhom RX One -  Unlucky Timing but great WEX customer service fixed it.  👍
I bought an Elinchrom RX One studio strobe from Wex. It was advertised with no power cable, no protective cap, & no modelling lamp. It was £88 (a great price) and I thought 'Yeah okay that's fine: - I already have a spare Elinchrom cap & modelling bulb, and I can order a cheap power lead on eBay.' I bought the cheap power cable & I now have a really nice little studio strobe for a very good price. (These little RX One strobes are really useful.)
The Unlucky Timing bit:
The day after my RX One arrived, Wex were advertising another used Elinchrom RX One (which I had not previously seen.) This one all the bits missing from mine!  This second one was £90 - so, I missed out on having all those missing bits included for just £2 extra! 😢
Great Service from WEX - I told them my story and they MORE than compensated me for my unlucky timing - Thanks WEX.

Title: Really impressed with Wex
Content: Really impressed with Wex part exchange service. I bought a second hand Fuji lens from Wex last year but I didn't get on with it, so I sold it back to them. The process was... suspiciously straightforward. A courier collected it from my house, I got my valuation a few days later (which matched the estimate) and the money was in my account 7 days after sending the lens. I was skeptical about sending an expensive bit of kit into the blue, but I got emails and timeframes at every stage which was helpful and reassuring. It's refreshing to get good service and clear communication. Nice one Wex.

Title: Nicola Payne
Content: Nicola Payne, assistant manager, at the Norwich branch made our Wex experience memorable, and very pleasant. We went to see the Olympus representative on the travelling roadshow, but he was sick, so Nicola stepped up and gave us the help we needed. Her customer service was second to none, and her knowledge was beyond what I had expected. She was also happy to help with follow up information and settings on my camera, and remained happy and supportive throughout.

Title: A proactive, dedicated team
Content:
I was cycling to Wex Manchester earlier today to collect a camera which had been booked in for a sensor clean.
On my way, I had a puncture. Team members Nigel and Jack not only let me borrow their bike pumps, but went the extra mile to offer and fit a new inner tube so that I could get home safely with my newly cleaned camera. I appreciate during busier store times they may have not been able to assist me so attentively, but I could see the effort was made.
I will always advocate Wex Manchester for their people. Over the years, I've found I can trust their knowledge and advice when it comes to kit, and rely on their proactive, dedicated attitude towards customer service. They're just good people and a true asset to Wex Photo Video.

Title: Mail order lens exchanged in local store
Content: I bought a Sigma wide angle zoom lens for my Nikon D5500 my mail order.  Arrived very well packaged but sadly would not work with my camera.  Before sending back I took it to the local Wex shop in Belfast.  Staff were very helpful and tested the lens on my camera and on a new SLR.  They had an identical lens in stock which worked fine so they refunded me there in store and I bought the working lens.  Very good experience and saved me the trouble of shipping to the original store.

Title: Canon EF 300mm F4 IS
Content: Just bought a Canon EF 300mm F4 IS from WEX it was described as 9 excellent condition, it was better than that it was like brand new. It came with the original box, front and rear caps, padded case and paperwork. I have been a customer of WEX for quite a few years and on only one occasion had I had to complain but that was years ago. The packaging it arrived in was well padded and it arrived within 2 days brilliant well done WEX again, 5 stars all around.

Title: If Wex say it's Like New, it really is Like New
Content: Ordered a used lens from Wex after some pretty poor experiences with another large photo company *cough* MPB *cough* that had shaken my confidence in the veracity of grading systems. But, lo and behold, the "Like New" lens they sent to me was, in fact, like new! Unlike their competitor, Wex gave a true and thorough account of the lenses condition - in fact I'd actually say it was a bit better than I'd expected. Thank you Wex, you've restored my faith and I'll be buying more stuff from you again.

Title: Solid sales experience in Wex MK
Content:
Wex generally employs strong team members, readily available and on hand to provide experience driven insight and advice… often favouring sensible suggestions over simply pushing for the biggest sale…
BUT every now and again, one among their rank and file truly stands out.

At their wonderfully well equipped and equally stocked showroom in Milton Keynes, works a Sales Consultant by the name of Leonardo Moss.

Not overly favouring one brand over another “Leo” gave positives for each manufacturer in detail while taking me through my own somewhat specifically narrow and niche requirements.

He did a smashing job. Wex Mk is Great store with a decidedly respectful and professional approach.

Title: Excellent Service and product stock
Content:
Service - 5*
Product range - 5*
Used products - 5* excellent rating system and always surprisingly good sometimes indistinguishable from new when choosing 9+ rated.
Helpfulness - 5* emails always answered in a timely and polite way
Competitiveness- 4*. I would like to see a customer loyalty reward scheme eg occasional discount vouchers for the individual customers based on loyalty and total spend to date.
Returns - 4*. It is possible to print a 2 sided invoice with a returns section and label on the back. This would eliminate at least two steps in the process 
Delivery - 5* always well packaged and shockproof. Items often come much sooner than advised, which is always a pleasant surprise.

Highly recommend in the future

Title: Excellent buying and trade-in experience.

Title: Fantastic service

Title: Prompt service.
Content: Needed a new camera bag quickly for a foreign trip. Found the right bag for me, ordered it and it arrived in time for my trip. Very satisfied with the service and with my purchase.

Title: Quick and good value.
Content: I ordered a blower from Wex to keep my gear dust free. Item and postage were a very good price and it was sent nice and quickly.

Title: Bought some binoculars from wex
Content: Bought some binoculars from wex, they were the best online price I could find. The ordering process was easy and fast and the delivery was prompt. Everything was very good.

Title: Sold Canon camera & lenses
Content: I sold my Canon camera and some lenses through Wex.  The process was reasonably easy.  The only problem I had was with the courier collection (Parcel Force's fault).  In the end I took it to the Post Office and it was fine.  Equipment checked quickly, kept updated through the process.  Given an offer and accepted and within a day the money was in my account.  Would definitely use again and recommend.

Title: Outstanding help and Service at WEX…
Content:
I have been a customer of WEX Manchester for many years and have always received expert advise, courtesy and help . After reaching 75 I decided to trade my camera ,3 lenses and other items ( all Canon and purchased from WEX) for a Compact.
I was dealt with by John Willis .He was excellent, helpful and not only calculated very fair trade in but also help in purchasing my Sony Compact.
John guided me through all the process ,clearly for my benefit and the Company. 
I will always continue to use and recommend WEX Manchester.
Many thanks John

Title: An efficient and friendly experience…
Content: An efficient and friendly experience every time, helpful  and knowledgeable staff; delivery is fast and reliable, items arrive well protected and in perfect condition.

Title: Excellent Service

Title: Wex Photo Video never disappoints
Content: Wex Photo Video never disappoints. Top quality goods always delivered on time, with notifications of the actual time of delivery throughout.

Title: Arrived on time,well packaged

Title: Great service
