Title: Honest Trustworthy Company
Content:
I recently visited the Wex Photo Video store in Edinburgh to purchase a camera for aircraft interior photos. I was greeted by Robyn, who was incredibly knowledgeable about cameras and photography. She took the time to understand my needs and recommend the perfect camera for me. She was also completely honest and upfront about the pros and cons of each camera, which I really appreciated.

I was hugely impressed with Robyn's integrity, knowledge, and honesty. I would absolutely recommend Wex Photo Video to anyone looking for a camera or photography equipment

Title: What an excellent company
Content: What an excellent company bought an item in the afternoon and it arrived the next dat unexpectedly as i had not paid for next day delivery and it was at a great price too.  could not be beaten - same item on eBay was a lot dearer.

Title: Quick reliable service at a fair price
Content: Quick reliable service at a fair price

Title: In stock and a fast delivery
Content: It was the only retailer that had all the items I needed in stock and not on an order waiting list. Online ordering was easy and delivery was very fast.

Title: Highly recommended
Content: I pre-ordered a camera that was in very short supply worldwide and had to wait 3 months or so (it was unavailable anywhere in the UK all that time). Wex kept me updated by email several times to let me know they hadn't forgotten me. When it was available I had to phone to re-authorise the payment. The staff were polite, efficient, and encouragingly human, and all was done quickly despite my bank's fraud detection algorithms getting in the way (not that I'm complaining about that.) I've used Wex for decades, and they've never let me down on price or customer service. Highly recommended.

Title: Used equipment accurately described and…
Content: Used equipment accurately described and rated, fast efficient service

Title: excellent aftercare service
Content: I pre ordered a Sony A6700 which despite being brand new turned out to have a fault.  First time Ive ever had that happen with a new camera and I didn't realise at first, assuming I'd set it up wrong or something.  When I did I rang up customer services, who as it was within the first 45 days still, sent out a pre paid return label with no quibble, and a replacement new camera was on my doorstep seven days later.  The replacement works perfectly and I'm delighted with it and the service from Wex.  Thank you.

Title: Trade In & Upgrade
Content:
From the moment I first went into WEX Newcastle, until Trade In & Sales was handled by Phil Ryott, I had a great and friendly experience, I was looked after very professionally by Phil, trading in my old gear, purchasing a new camera, Phil was very helpful. I got out of my visit to Wex Newcastle, everything I wanted "A Good Trade In Price & Good Sale Price" The shop had a very friendly and professional atmosphere.
Many Thanks Phil and all Of The Team @ WEX Newcastle.

Title: Easy no-nonsense return of faulty item
Content: Easy no-nonsense return of lens with manufacturing defect - thanks

Title: Wex Photo Video
Content: The people at Wex Photo Video have been excellent on the two occasions I have used their services in recent weeks. In terms of information on the items, packaging and delivery times, I really cant see how they can be beat. I will happily use their services again.

Title: Wandrd 21 Backpack
Content: Recently purchased a camera bag and wanted to share my experience. Firstly, the delivery was impressively fast. However, I realized that I had ordered the wrong-sized bag once it arrived. I promptly contacted WEX and explained the situation, requesting a return. They swiftly provided a return label, although it wasn't prepaid – which I understood since the mistake was mine. The refund process was remarkably speedy. A few days later, I bought the correct bag, and, once again, it arrived promptly. I've been a loyal customer of this company for nearly 20 years and continue to be satisfied with their exceptional service. It remains one of my preferred online destinations for camera gear.

Title: Excellent service
Content: Excellent service, both at time of sale and after when a minor problem arose on the tripod which was sorted immediately even though it was a manufacturer issue.

Title: Fantastic customer service
Content: I ordered a lens hood for an OM Systems lens from Wex Photo Video a few months ago. It had been on order with another dealer for about 9 months without success. As soon as the lens hood came in, even though the cost was below that which qualifies for free delivery it was couriered to me the following day because I was going on holiday in a few days and because, I was told, it had been order for a long time. That is fantastic customer service and I will certainly use this company for any further orders.
